snippet: To appreciate the thrill and misery of the Volvo Ocean Race, watch videos from the boats that show just how much of a pounding the crews are taking.
abstract: Editorial observes that the fifth leg of the Volvo Ocean Race has been completed by most of the teams participating in the event; marvels at the speed with which the contestants will circle the globe.
lead_paragraph: To appreciate the thrill and misery of the Volvo Ocean Race, watch videos from the boats that show just how much of a pounding the crews are taking.

headline.seo: At Speed on the Breakneck Ocean
headline.main: At Speed on the Breakneck Ocean
headline.print_headline: At Speed on the Breakneck Ocean
